[[/collapsible]]

**Subject:** Limeyy

**Commentary:** Limeyy is perhaps the wiki's most favorite citrus fruit, and the coat of arms is therefore a slice of lime. People say coats of arms don't grow on trees. And they are right. This coat however is supported by one. And of course it has to be a lemon tree.

**How the prompt fits in:** Citrus fruits are sour. That's it. This was pretty much a no-brainer.
